entry.title: How to easily set up and version control your Machine Learning Pipelines
entry.summary:
Description

Full Title: How to easily set up and version your Machine Learning pipelines, using DVC and MLV-tools

Stephanie Bracaloni, Sarah Diot-Girard

Have you ever heard about Machine Learning versioning solutions? Have you ever tried one of them? And what about automation? Come with us and learn how to easily build versionable pipelines! This tutorial explains through small exercises how to setup a project using DVC and MLV-tools.
